biotools.summary: Probabilistic framework for the discovery of single nucleotide variants that overlap copy number alterations from next generation sequencing data.  This software explicitly integrates information about copy number state of different genomic segments into the inference of single nucleotide variants.

bioschemas.name: CoNAn-SNV
